Package lib.interfaces

Interface CustomNetworkADT<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of elements stored in the network
All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomNetwork
public interface CustomNetworkADT<T>
The CustomNetworkADT interface defines the contract for a customizable network structure that allows operations on a graph, where vertices and edges store generic types of data. It provides methods for retrieving connected vertices, accessing a specific vertex as a Room, and obtaining all vertices in the graph.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ArrayUnorderedList<T> getConnectedVertices​(T vertex)
    Retrieves a list of vertices that are directly connected to the specified vertex in the graph.
    Room getRoom​(java.lang.String name)
    Retrieves a Room object from the graph based on the specified room name.
    ArrayUnorderedList<T> getVertices()
    Retrieves a list of all vertices present in the graph.

  • Method Details

    • getConnectedVertices

      ArrayUnorderedList<T> getConnectedVertices​(T vertex)
      Retrieves a list of vertices that are directly connected to the specified vertex in the graph. A connection exists if an edge between the given vertex and another vertex has a weight that is not equal to positive infinity.
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertex for which connected vertices are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an ArrayUnorderedList<T> containing all vertices directly connected to the specified vertex
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified vertex is not found in the graph

    • getRoom

      Room getRoom​(java.lang.String name)
      Retrieves a Room object from the graph based on the specified room name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the room to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Room object corresponding to the specified name if found, null otherwise

    • getVertices

      ArrayUnorderedList<T> getVertices()
      Retrieves a list of all vertices present in the graph.
      Returns:
      an ArrayUnorderedList<T> containing all vertices in the graph
